string.name: desc
string.value: Allows one to lead up to 3 pets at once. (Passive skill)

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 3]\nHurls snail shells to attack monsters from long distance.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 3]\nEnables the user to recover HP constantly for 30 sec. \n#cTerms between skills : 10 min.#

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 1]\nUses the spirit of a legend to use a scroll on an item that cannot be normally equipped by the character.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 1]\nEnables one to ride on a tamed monster and use it as a method of transportation.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 3]\nEnables the character to move around quickly for a short amount of time. \n#cTerms between skills : 1 min.#

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 2]\nYou board a spaceship. While aboard, you can increase your movement and jump abilities by pressing the right/left direction key twice. #Available until: 06-08-2009 at 00 hour#

string.value: Consumes 10 MP. Weapon and Magic Defense +10, Speed 150, Jump 120

string.name: h2
string.value: Consumes 10 MP. Weapon and Magic Defense +10, Speed 150, Jump 120

string.value: [Master Level : 1]\nChanges the condition of the Krypto found at the Space Mine. #cAvailable until: 06-08-2009 at 00 hour#

string.name: desc

string.value: [Master Level : 20]\nEnhances the effects of recovery items including potions or lengthens the duration of items applied to the status of the character, with an exception of recovery items such as the Elixir that provide recovery based on %.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 20]\nThrows a poisonous Throwing Star. Monsters that have been struck will be poisoned according to the pre-established success rate. It can be used against one monster up to 3 times during which the monster's HP will not go any lower than 1.

string.name: desc
string.value:
[Master Level : 30]
Tosses up 12 monsters in the air. The monsters that are in the air will be vulnerable to attacks, therefore receiving more damage than on the ground. Can only triggered right after Triple Swing.
Required Skill : #cTriple Swing Level 20#
[Command : #cArrow Key : Up + attack key#]
